name: Loup Loup Ski Bowl
description: Tucked between the Okanogan and Methow Valleys, The "Loup" offers skiing like it used to be...short lift lines and a friendly small-town vibe. In addition to an amazing amount of terrain packed into a manageable 300-acre footprint, the Loup offers 10k+ of groomed Nordic trails, tubing and the PNW's only alpine Luge experience.
